portfolio.title: Our portfolio features a diverse array of digital products crucial for the growth of contemporary businesses. projects: A digital e-wallet mobile app offering a gamified experience, now utilized at over 260 fueling stations. Users can effortlessly top-up, play games, find stations, send credit to others, and earn points for their activities,  level up their profiles, and unlock exclusive rewards

An internal gamified well-being app for Bank Muscat, designed to encourage fitness through rewarding activities. The app fosters friendly competition among employees and departments, promoting a healthy lifestyle.
